response_parsed.title: Implementing Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a concise explanation on how to create and deploy microservices using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+.
Python 3.12+ is the recommended version for taking advantage of performance improvements and new features.
Microservices architecture allows you to break down an application into smaller independent services, increasing scalability and maintainability.
FastAPI supports asynchronous functions out-of-the-box, which improves performance in microservices.
FastAPI uses OpenAPI 3.0 specifications for easy API documentation generation.
